title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8300 - Capital Local Expenditures for School District's Share of Additional Budgeted Capital Local Expenditures Made by a Board of Cooperative Educational Services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8300 - Capital Local Expenditures for School District's Share of Additional Budgeted Capital Local Expenditures Made by a Board of Cooperative Educational Services

State Regulations
ยง 8300.1 - Definition of Capital Local Expenditures

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8300

Amended

New

York State Register December 30, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 52, eff. 12/30/2020

Statutory Authority: Tax Law section 171, subdivision First; Education Law section 2023-a(2)(c)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
